an10.155:1.1: “Mendicants, you should not associate with a person who has ten qualities.
an10.155:1.3: Wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
an10.155:1.4: You should not associate with a person who has these ten qualities.
an10.155:2.1: You should associate with a person who has ten qualities.
an10.155:2.3: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
an10.155:2.4: You should associate with a person who has these ten qualities.”
